bibl.title: The Oxford Classical Dictionary. Third Edition.
bibl.note: 6,250 contributions written by an international team of 364 scholars between 1991 and 1994. See in part.: Herwig MAEHLER, Books, Greek and Roman, pp. 249-252; - Dorothy J. THOMPSON, Egypt, Ptolemaic, p. 511-512; - Dominic W. RATHBONE, Egypt, Roman, p. 512; - Walter Eric Harold COCKLE, Ostraca, p. 1082-1083; - Herwig MAEHLER, Papyrology, Greek, p. 1109-1111; - J. David THOMAS, Papyrology, Latin, p. 1111-1112.
HORNBLOWER Simon and Antony SPAWFORTH (Edd.), The Oxford Classical Dictionary. Third Edition.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 1996, 4°, lvii-1640 pp. ISBN 0-19-866172-X. £70.
Hornblower Spawforth Maehler Thompson Rathbone Cockle Thomas
